name: Strange Paradise
description:
Created in Unity 2020.2.4f1.

First attempt at making an RPG, decided to create a demo-length game. I tested the game as I made it, things SHOULD be stable. Game controls will display on screen, but I think the battle menu controls might not be, and may not be intuitive. Space should work as select.

The game technically is not finished, but I think I will take a break from its development. Someday I may return to this, maybe I will never return to this.

I was too lazy to find audio tracks or sound effects.
